# PLAY WITH THESE
radius = 370
frames = 30
bridges = 10
degrees = 360
rotation = 0

bodySize = 80
legSpread = 90
legLength = 100
eyeSize = 4
eyeSpacing = 12


# This defines the spiderweb
class SpiderWeb
    constructor: (@x, @y, @radius, @frames, @bridges, @degrees, @rotation) ->
        @x = @x ? 250
        @y = @y ? 250
        @radius = @radius ? 250
        @frames = @frames ? 16
        @bridges = @bridges ? 20
        @degrees = @degrees ? 360
        @rotation = @rotation ? 0
        @frameAngle = @degrees / @frames
        @draw()
    drawFrame: () ->
        moveTo @x , @y
        for i in [ 0 .. @frames ]
            if i * @frameAngle != 360
                radians = (i * @frameAngle + @rotation)*(Math.PI / 180)
                x = Math.cos(radians)
                y = -Math.sin(radians)
                line (x*@radius) , (y*@radius)
    drawBridge: () ->
        r = @radius
        for web in [ 1 .. @bridges ]
            r /= 1.2
            for i in [ 0 ... @frames ]
                # Starting postition
                r1 = (i * @frameAngle + @rotation)*(Math.PI / 180)
                x1 = Math.cos(r1)
                y1 = -Math.sin(r1)
                
                # End position
                r2 = (i * @frameAngle + @frameAngle + @rotation)*(Math.PI / 180)
                x2 = Math.cos(r2)
                y2 = -Math.sin(r2)
                moveTo x1 * r + @x , y1 * r + @y
                lineTo x2 * r + @x , y2 * r + @y
    draw: ( ) ->
        this.drawFrame()
        this.drawBridge()

# Here is the drawing
background setSaturation(darkpurple,-25)
stroke white
web = new SpiderWeb(250,250, radius, frames, bridges, degrees, rotation)
# Spider Body
stroke white, 10
moveTo 250, 0
line 0, 200
move 0, 200
color black
stroke 0
ellipse bodySize * 0.8, bodySize
# Spider Legs
stroke black, 5
color null
pairOfLegs = (flipHori,flipVert) ->
    spread = legSpread * flipHori
    length = legLength * flipVert
    polygon spread, length, spread * 0.7, length * 2
    polygon spread * 1.3, length * 0.4, spread * 1.7, length * 1.5
pairOfLegs(1,1)
pairOfLegs(-1,1)
pairOfLegs(1,-1)
pairOfLegs(-1,-1)

#Spider Head
stroke 0
color black
move 0, bodySize
ellipse bodySize * 0.5, bodySize * 0.4
color orangered
move eyeSpacing * -1.5, eyeSpacing / -2
for [1 .. 4]
    circle eyeSize
    move 0, eyeSpacing
    circle eyeSize
    move eyeSpacing, eyeSpacing * -1
